repos_data.description: The Sleuth KitÂ® (TSK) is a library and collection of command line digital forensics tools that allow you to investigate volume and file system data. The library can be incorporated into larger digital forensics tools and the command line tools can be directly used to find evidence.
A tool for forensic file system reconstruction.
Forensics tool for NTFS (parser, mft, bitlocker, deleted files)
MFT and USN parser that allows direct extraction in filesystem timeline format (mactime), dump all resident files in the MFT in their original folder structure and run yara rules over them all.
